title: No more worlds missions?
body: ive run out of missions to do for the golden championship ashe {{champion:22}} , is my client gitched?

replies.body: Nope, week 2 missions are aimed to start around Oct 2 aligned with Worlds.  Hang tight!
what should i do if i completed a mission while there was an alert, and now i cant complete the quest for four missions. it says i have 3/4
Everyone should be at 3/4 until Week  starts.  Some players were able to get the next part, but that was due to a bug.
I don't think so. Me and my brother have the same problem. That already makes 5 accounts.
